column4: WingNut: XP's partitioner is called Disk Management apparently

WingNut: Start----> Programs ----> Accessories ---> sys tools  iirc
WingNut: looks like it, not on my home machine, but its on my pro machine....
That link gives plenty of technical details on why it's bad and dangerous.  You should check it out
read the link.  Beryl is unstable yes, but it doesn't break anything else except itself.
